Summary: Red ORB in Tampa, Fl. Hills ave and 50th st. REACTED to laser
divs: sighting details3-26-12 9:00 pm. i was heading east on hillsborough ave @ 50th st. in tampa. i noticed a strange red orb\light in the sky. the orb was approx 300 ft. high and heading from the nw to the se. very slightly pulsating and about the speed of a helicopter watching traffic. i watched this object thru the entire stop light cycle as it is a triggered light. this is when i took the pics (total of 3). when the traffic light changed i pulled into a driveway and got out of my car. i pointed my green laser well in front of the orb - it immediately slowed down. as i was switching my camera to video it started pulsating faster and started dimming at the same time until i could no longer see it. the sighting lasted about 3 full minutes. the sky was nice and clear. the white dot just to the right and above the orb is jupiter.
